sentences.en: a despot who disposed of all his enemies, real or imagined.
sentences.cn: 暴君杀死了他所有的敌人，无论是真的还是想象的

sentences.en: an incinerator built to dispose of toxic waste
sentences.cn: 为处理有毒废料建造的一座焚化炉

sentences.en: Chinese vases are disposed around the gallery.
sentences.cn: 中国花瓶摆放在展馆四周。

sentences.en: disposed of the problem quickly.
sentences.cn: 很快地解决了这个问题

sentences.en: He alleged that they had hired an assassin to dispose of him.
sentences.cn: 他宣称他们已雇了刺客来除掉他。

sentences.en: His criminal record does not dispose me to trust him.
sentences.cn: 他有前科,我不能轻易相信他.

sentences.en: His criminal records do not dispose me to trust him.
sentences.cn: 他的前科迫使我无法信任他.

sentences.en: How could he dispose of the goods produced by the eight factories?
sentences.cn: 八个厂的货销不去又怎样?

sentences.en: I was very loath to dispose of them for a trifle.
sentences.cn: 我极不愿意得到一点点钱,就把它们让给了别人.

sentences.en: It has been traditional for them to dispose of their waste to municipal sewers.
sentences.cn: 一般毛纺废水直接排入城市下水道.

sentences.en: Just fold up the nappy and dispose of it in the normal manner.
sentences.cn: 把尿布叠起，像平常扔东西一样扔掉即可。

sentences.en: Madeline could always dispose herself so as to make room for a gentleman.
sentences.cn: 马德琳向来能够自行挪动一下,腾出地方来让一位先生坐下.

sentences.en: Please think about to implement the IDisposable interface and write method body for the Dispose method.
sentences.cn: 可以考虑实现IDisposable接口并为Dispose方法写好清理资源的方法体.

sentences.en: the difficulties of disposing of nuclear waste
sentences.cn: 处理核废料的困难

sentences.en: The low salary did not dispose him to accept the positon.
sentences.cn: 微薄的待遇使他不愿接受这项工作.

sentences.en: The suspect was taken unawares, without the chance to dispose of the evidence.
sentences.cn: 嫌疑人被弄了个措手不及，根本来不及销毁证据。

sentences.en: These goods are difficult to dispose of.
sentences.cn: 这些货不好脱手.

sentences.en: We must dispose of too many essential features of the investigated phenomenon.
sentences.cn: 我们不得不排除所研究现象的许多基本特征.

sentences.en: We will have to dispose of the mice in the attic.
sentences.cn: 我们必须消灭阁楼里的老鼠.

sentences.en: Widows have the right to dispose of property they inherit, without interference from anyone.
sentences.cn: 丧偶妇女有权处分继承的财产, 任何人不得不干涉.

words.tran_cn: 可任意处理的；可自由使用的；用完即可丢弃的
有…倾向的；打算做…的；有某种健康状态的
处置；[心理] 性情；[军] 部署；倾向
处理；配置；使适应（dispose的过去分词）；使有倾向

trans.tran_en: to arrange things or put them in their places

trans.tran_cn: 去掉； 处理， 解决
排列，布置；使倾向于，使易于
